==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* "{{w|Pankration}}" (from Ancient Greek {{Lang|mini=1|grc=παγκράτιον|grc_rm=pankrátion|grc_tl=all powers}}) was a combat sport in the Greek Olympics that allowed practically all forms of techniques that did not involve weapons or other objects, similar to modern mixed martial arts.
